title: Just a Bit Wrong
description: This is an alternative cover edition of ASIN B015EL9ZKK. Zach Hardaway is one of the best physiotherapists in Europe.Tristan DuVal is a young soccer star with a groin injury. They despise each other from the moment they meet. As far as Zach is concerned, Tristan is a rich, spoiled brat who is too used to getting his own way.As far as Tristan is concerned, Zach is a bossy, presumptuous jerk. Tristan hates Zach. He does. The problem is, he also wants to shove Zach against the nearest wall and climb him like a tree.Warning: explicit MM content, minor D/s undertones.
author: Alessandra Hazard
